A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t want to dislike this movie. There were moments I loved. But\, there are swathes of bad writing\, the whole thing is poorly structured\, I was not invested in multiple story lines\, about half of the dramatic payoff moments felt very forced\, and there were several times I felt more like I was watching Space Balls than Star Wars. I don’t dislike it for any stupid fan boy loyalty to source material or what’s come before\, it’s just that I n spite of its moments of brilliance\, this is a poorly made film. Hopefully I like it more on repeat viewing\, I’d love to come back and give it an extra star.
